text:
In a large hospital specializing in Hematology and Gynecologic Surgery, a team of statisticians and medical professionals are conducting a health data study. text: You are part of a medical research team examining the relationship between various patient conditions and their treatments in a large, urban hospital. One of the main areas you are focusing on is the Endocrinology department, where many patients suffer from Osteoporosis. The research team has observed that a subset of these patients who are prescribed Aspirin has also come down with Septicemia, a potentially life-threatening infection that spreads throughout the body quickly.
